extensionDescription.message: Short break reminder; reminds you to look away from your screen to stretch, get healty. The program frequently alerts you to take micro-pauses and rest breaks.

reminderContent.message: Take a short break from your work to stretch, get stronger
reminderContent.description: Tells the user to give a short break

reminderContent2.description: Tells the user to give a short break

reminderContent3.message: He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
reminderContent3.description: Tells the user to give a short break

breakContent.message: You Better Give a break for $timeWithoutBreak$ minutes
breakContent.description: Tells the user to give a long break
